title: Can I read duas from my phone in voluntary prayers after Durood, Salutation on Prophet Assimalhakeem
transcript: um said from the uk he says when i want to make dua i know that the best dua is the authentic dua from the authentic sunnah so i if i'm in voluntary prayers not fart and i'm after the shahada and the salutation or what they call the root now what's remaining what is remaining in the salaam the conclusion of the prayer so i take my mobile phone and i have written down say you do this i had written down a number of duas authentic that the prophet used to make can i do that no problem in that abir from you
